item.description:
So we did this last year and we had a blast combining groups! Weird how I just don't age.... 29 AGAIN!

Come see your meetup friends and meet new ones while we celebrate my birthday--no need to bring gifts unless you really want to. (kidding) I'll be inviting a few other groups -- the more the merrier! We have the private room and it will be fully staffed so you can order off the menu if you wish. Please plan to maintain your own tab. Let's see how the night goes....maybe we can go dancing later.

You don't have to be there at 6-get there when you can. If you want to go home and change and come later or come straight from work. I expect we will be there until 10 or 11 pending the vibe. Bring your friends or just bring yourself. I'll be wearing a lei (seems to be the best way to find me) so come say hi.

I hope you can make it!
www.vloraboston.com

Please be courteous and update your RSVP accordingly-it's frustrating for organizers to try and manage numbers.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a large flower on my shirt
item.name: Cocktails at Vlora in the Back Bay...come join us!
